name: Upper Nirar Dam
description: Upper Nirar Dam is part of the Parambikulam Aliyar Project and is used for hydroelectric power generation and irrigation purposes.

name: Lower Nirar Dam
description: Lower Nirar Dam is an important component for water storage and supply, aiding irrigation and power generation.

name: Thunakadavu Dam
description: Thunakadavu Dam, situated in a scenic area, plays a key role in irrigation and electricity generation.

name: Solayar Dam
description: Solayar Dam is known for its vast water storage and contribution to irrigation and power generation.

name: Aliyar Dam
description: Aliyar Dam is a popular tourist spot and plays a crucial role in the irrigation system of Tamil Nadu.

name: Thirumurthi Dam
description: Thirumurthi Dam is well-known for its picturesque surroundings and contribution to irrigation and hydroelectric power.
